conversation_flow.user_message: How do I register a new product I just purchased?
conversation_flow.agent_response:
I can register your product right now. Here are your options:

**Quick Registration Methods:**

| Method | How It Works | Time |
|--------|--------------|------|
| Tell Me | Share model + serial number | 30 sec |
| Scan QR | Use phone camera on product | 15 sec |
| Receipt Upload | Photo of purchase receipt | 45 sec |

**What I Need:**
1. Product model or name
2. Serial number (on product label)
3. Purchase date

**Example:** "Register my new Torque Wrench Pro, serial TW-2026-45678, purchased today"

**Auto-Registration Available:**
Products ordered through your dealer account are automatically registered. Your recent order (ORD-2026-08471) will auto-register upon delivery confirmation.

**Benefits of Registration:**
- Warranty activation (required within 30 days)
- Recall notifications
- Software update alerts
- Trade-in value tracking

Source: [Product Database + Registration API]

design_principles.visual_elements: 1 status indicator OR 1 table per response
